title: Drive Vaccine PC Restore Plus 10.5 Build 2700918799 + Keygen
description:
Drive Vaccine PC Restore Plus 10.5 Build 2700918799 + Keygen [4realtorrentz]

Drive Vaccine immunizes your PC's from any changes being made - making PC's bullet-proof and unbreakable! It is designed for public access computing environments, such as computer labs, kiosks, internet cafes, libraries, etc.. 

Simplify the maintenance of public access PC's with bullet-proof protection
It takes fortitude to service PC's in the public domain - at hotels, internet cafes, libraries and educational institutions - where users are not always careful and usage is high. Drive Vaccine's simplifies the management of public access PC's.

Drive Vaccine is a non-restrictive hard drive restore product designed for public access workstations. The PC users feel as though they have complete control over the PC. But regardless of what they do, including erasing files, installing software or even hacking the system registry, Drive Vaccine will automatically restore the PC to your desired system state -- every time the workstation is restarted, or on any set schedule. Making the workstations perfectly configured and available for the next user.

Key Features:

- Restore on Reboot
- Restore on Log-off
- Restore on Idle PC (no PC activity)
- Restore on an hourly schedule
- Restore on a Daily schedule
- Restore Daily on first startup of day
- Restore on a Weekly schedule
- Automatically accept OS and Anti virus updates
- Keep important data using "Immune Space"
- Block access to CD ROM and USB ports
- No hardware (no dongle or recovery card) required
- Protect unlimited hard disk partitions
- Recover the stable original state of hard disks automatically on any schedule (every reboot, log-off, end-of-day, weekly, monthly)
- Easily write-protect each hard disk with two clicks (restore on reboot)
- Block USB devices and CD Media
- Remote Management Console for remote network administration (Free of cost)
- Create an Immune Space
- No specific hard disk partition setup required

What's new in version 10.5 Build 2700918799:

- Added "Windows 10 Clients" Group in Remote Management Console.
- Fixed automation Windows Updates, by just doing "Critical Updates" only.
- Fixed "Setup.exe" won't start problem caused by problem in GPT partition structure.
- Modify the subsystem to handle large RAM on UEFI based system.
- Re-design driver security to stop security cracks.

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Don't run
3. Patch hosts or Block all outgoing processes
4. Choose offline activation method and use keygen to generate activation codes
5. You will need to restart for activation to complete (If fails retry making sure to block its connections)
6. Done
